# Grenish Rai - Portfolio Website

## About
This is the personal portfolio website of Grenish Rai, a Full Stack Developer and BCA graduate from Sikkim Manipal Institute of Technology. He specializes in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, and AI/ML.

## Site Structure
- **Homepage (/)**: Main portfolio with hero, about, projects, and hackathon sections.
- **Blog (/blogs)**: Technical articles fetched from the Dev.to API.
- **Contact (/contact)**: Contact information and social media links.

## Key Features
- Modern responsive design with a dark theme.
- Interactive project showcase and hackathon timeline.
- Dynamic blog integration with Dev.to.
- Built with the Next.js App Router.

## Technologies Used
- Next.js 15.3.1
- React 19
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Lucide React (icons)
- GSAP (animations)
- Bun (package manager)

## Content Focus
- Full stack development projects.
- AI/ML applications and experiments.
- Open source contributions (NPM packages, APIs).
- Hackathon participation and achievements.
- Technical blog posts on web development.

## Contact Information
- Email: mrcoder2033d@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/grenish
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/grenish-rai
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/grenish_rai
